question.body: Which of the following movements is not properly matched with its function?

multiple_choice.choice: isotonic, concentric - involved in moving a load
isotonic, eccentric - involved in bone stability
isometric - involved in maintaining joint stability
muscle tone - involved in maintaining body posture.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Isotonic Concentric contractions would be involved in moving a load.
Correct. Isotonic Eccentric contractions occur when a muscle lengthens. Isometric contractions would be used for balance and resisting motion.
Incorrect. Isometric contractions do play a role in maintaining bone and joint stability.
Incorrect. Muscle tone is responsible for maintaining body posture.
